scripts.start: stmux --title "[PROJECT_NAME]" --mouse --wait error --error ERROR --method beep,system -- [ [ -t "[nails: client] this shows the react server logs. " "npm run start:client"  :  -t "[nails: server] this shows the back end nodeJS server logs. " "npm run start:server"  ] : [ -t "[nails: mongoDB]   type 'help' for list of mongo commands. " "npm run start:db" ] ]
